title: 2019 NRL Grand Final: Watch The Free Live Stream Here!
text:
Image: Getty Images

The 2019 NRL Grand Final kicks off at approximately 7:20pm AEDT. If you're not in a suitably-equipped venue with a TV, have no fear — you can live stream the match free from your phone or laptop with just a few clicks. Here are the links!

Channel Nine's 9Now web app will be providing a free live stream of the NRL Grand Final. In fact, this will be the only place to catch the game legally online. (The NRL Live Pass app only provides access to the regular season matches and eight Finals Series matches - not the Premiership match.)

Reminder: NRL Live Pass Isn't Streaming The Grand Final This Year If you're planning to stream the 2018 NRL Grand Final through the NRL Live Pass app, we have some bad news for you. Due to a change in digital rights ownership, the NRL Grand Final will only be available through Channel 9 streaming services. Here's how to get connected. Read more

In addition to the free-to-air coverage, the app includes extra live streams that aren't available on the telly: Namely, a player cam, a coach cam and live match statistics.

If you're watching on a phone or tablet, you can also get the mobile-optimized version for iOS and Android.
description: The 2019 NRL Grand Final kicks off at approximately 7:20pm AEDT. If you're not in a suitably-equipped venue with a TV, have no fear — you can live stream the match free from your phone or laptop with just a few clicks. Here are the links!...
